title: Portage police notebook for February 7, 2018
maintext:
Information is taken from the records of the Portage Police Department and does not represent a comprehensive list of police activity. Each individual named in this report is presumed to be innocent until proven guilty in a court of law.
Between 10:38 a.m. Monday and 4:36 a.m. Wednesday police responded to 76 calls.
Police issued 14 red tag warnings for vehicles covered with snow and 19 notices for failure to clear sidewalks.
West Emmett Street: Police on Wednesday at 3:45 a.m. responded to a domestic disturbance where a 44-year-old Portage man and a 30-year-old Portage man were taken into custody following an argument escalating into a physical altercation.
